data.author: Hedgehogs265

changelog.release_notes: V1.1 didn't seem to actually update? Here's 1.2 to try and fix that

-Fixed settings not loading properly
-Improved battery efficiency
-Randomizes on selecting Enable Random
-Random guaranteed to be different faces
v1.0 First release is out! I've been working hard on this watchface. It's my first one so I hope you like it! Feel free to ask or send me an email if you have any critiques or suggestions!

data.description:
*Currently there is a bug that causes the face to not properly stay at the selected boss and power up. I will get to this issue as soon as I have the chance but I'm limited on time currently. 


Megaman Themed Pebble Time watchface that shows bluetooth status, pebble battery life, Android phone battery life (with companion app). Depending on settings will randomize which power up and boss every hour or they can be selected in the app settings! 6 bosses, 6 power ups, and more to come!

If android phone battery is not turned on it uses the minutes remaining in the hour as the bosses HP.

latest_release.release_notes: V1.1 didn't seem to actually update? Here's 1.2 to try and fix that

data.title: Megaman Time
